en.title: FE Co-Sponsor World Corporate Golf Challenge Malaysia.
en.content:
FE is proud to announce the co-sponsorship of World Corporate Golf Challenge Malaysia (WCGCM) to be held from 06th April 2008 to 09th June 2008. According to Margaret Yip, CEO, WCGCM provides Corporate Malaysia with a unique golf challenge, in that amateur golfers can eventually win their way to the World Finals held in Spain and experience the “ultimate” in golfing competition. WCGCM will be widely publicized through the media in Malaysia.  FE will be sponsoring total prize and cash value of RM 100,000 for the winners (including for the Longest Drive).

Note:  Margaret Yip met FE at the PGA Merchandise Show in Orlando, USA. Margaret was impressed that a Malaysian company can go to the BIGGEST golf merchandising show in the world and make waves there.  Margaret is now a QP wearer.
